text: jyare te'o'e potano kothalo kholyo to potanum bhathum joyum, je temane api devamam avyum hatum, kaheva lagya ke he amara pita apanane biju sum jo'i'e che? Ju'o, a amarum bhathum pana amane pachum apavamam avyum. Ame potana kuntumbijano mate la'i avisum ane amara bha'ini dekharekha pana rakhisum ane eka unta jetalum anaja vadhare lavisum, a mapa to ghanum ja sarala che
